ProjectTitle: PulseFlour - Digestive, techno-functional and sensorial properties of pulse-based flours as impacted by their microstructural organization
InitialFeedbackHistory: 28/07/2023 [REDACTED] data: [REDACTED] recruiting and contacting participants and by collecting informed consents you will process personal data, please include this in your ethics application. [REDACTED] you indicate that there is potential for valorization, therefore IP may be a factor restricting sharing, best to discuss this with LRD towards the end of your project to see if and how you can share data. [REDACTED] note that a DMP asks about the sharing of data underlying your publications, not about publishing (peer reviewed) articles in journals.
